planetary.name: ClimateChange
planetary.blurb: Atmospheric carbon dioxide concentration, parts per million (ppm)

planetary.name: OceanAcidification
planetary.blurb:
Average saturation of 
 aragonite (calcium carbonate) 
at the ocean surface, as a percentage of pre-industrial levels

planetary.name: ChemicalPollution
planetary.blurb: No global control variable yet defined

planetary.name: Nitrogen
planetary.blurb:
Phosphorus and reactive 
Nitrogen applied to land as 
fertiliser, millions of tons per year
planetary.current: Around 14 and rising (Phosphorus), Around 150 million and rising (Nitrogen)

planetary.name: FreshWater
planetary.blurb: Blue water consumption, cubic kilometres per year

planetary.name: Land
planetary.blurb: Area of forested land as a proportion of forest-covered land prior to human alteration

planetary.name: Biodiversity
planetary.blurb:
Rate of species extinction 
per million species per year

planetary.name: Air
planetary.blurb: No global control variable yet defined

planetary.name: OZone
planetary.blurb:
Concentration of ozone 
in the stratosphere, in Dobson Units (DU)

social.name: Water
social.blurb: Population without access to improved drinking water
social.blurb2: Population without access to improved sanitation

social.name: Health
social.blurb: Population in countries with under-five mortality rate exceeding 25 per 1,000 live births
social.blurb2: Population in countries with life expectancy at birth of less than 70 years

social.name: Income
social.blurb: Population living on less than the international poverty limit of $3.10 a day
social.blurb2: Proportion of young people (aged 15-24) seeking but not able to find work

social.name: Peace
social.blurb: Population in countries scoring 50 or less out of 100 in the Corruption Perceptions Index
social.blurb2: Population in countries with a homicide rate of 10 or more per 10,000

social.name: Political
social.blurb: Population in countries scoring 0.5 or less out of 1.0 in the Voice and Accountability Index

social.name: Social
social.blurb: Population living in countries with a Palma ratio of 2 or more (the ratio of the income share of the top 10% of people to that of the bottom 40%)

social.name: Gender
social.blurb: Representation gap between women and men in national parliaments
social.blurb2: Worldwide earnings gap between women and men

social.name: Housing
social.blurb: Global urban population living in slum housing in developing countries

social.name: Networks
social.blurb: Population stating that they are without someone to count on for help in times of trouble
social.blurb2: Population without access to the internet

social.name: Energy
social.blurb2: Population lacking access to cooking facilities
